injection.notes: 0% recall expected with static detectors only — need LLM-based citation-auditor for semantic errors. Static detectors catch structural issues (orphaned footnotes, sequential arxiv IDs), not semantic corruptions.

crossReference.notes: Conservative fact extraction finds founding years, funding amounts, and employee counts. Zero contradictions is a good sign for cross-page consistency. The extraction can be expanded to catch more fact types.

fakeEntity.notes: Requires OPENROUTER_API_KEY for Perplexity search. Test cases defined for 8 fictional entities. Run with: crux evals run --suite=fake-entity

anthropic.notes: 44 factual claims with specific numbers/dates lacking inline citations. Many are backed by footnote-level references elsewhere but lack sentence-level citation attribution.

miri.notes: 27 uncited factual claims including dates, dollar amounts, and percentages.

anthropic.notes: Entity YAML and frontmatter descriptions are consistent.

miri.notes: Entity YAML and frontmatter descriptions are consistent.

crossReferenceChecker.notes: No cross-page contradictions found in 200 pages.
